title: Unknown Alphabet
content:
Hello

I'm not sure where this image is from, but can anybody give me an idea of what typeface is used, the era it is from and any other information you may have.

Merci

Tom

comments.content: This is most likely custom, and probably not commercially available.

Yeh, thought so.

Can you give me any ideas for alternate typefaces?
